title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details contain duplicated name validation and could be improved by merging the first and second columns.
i. The buttons are too small.
ii. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
iii. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
iv. The dialog appears very large for methods with many parameters.
